Wow if I could erase my memory of the dojin tiny evil and re read that 100 times over again I would seriously go read tiny evil the story makes so many people cry and id rather read loli murder rape then this shit again like you really need to put the same line from the otaku guy as the girl in the story more then naruto says I'm going to be Hokage in all of both animes all spinoffs and the manga combine Jheez he say I'm gonna cum like at least 150 times the hole 232 pages damn fuck the ending to what happen to good stories like tiny evil https://nhentai.net/g/173023/#comment-563711 go read this and tell me its trash

An NTR goddamit that time reversal was a false hope I didn't completely read the tags so I had hopes of turning this into a harem ffm until that bith childhood friend brought guys to fuck her

And yeah that ending was really weird this is the saddest manga from Hori Hiroaki, other her manga is not ever little sad like this. Btw that guy who get out from car in the end is Mimiko, idk what to say why she(in his body ofc) don't go to him when she saw he living good in her body. Maybe when she saw he have kid with other man,smiling and know he have good life, she don't go to him and leave everything like that, when we saw Mimiko in his body have good and probably Rich life too. This is something good in this, but still sad because they don't meet each other person to person again :/
First i thought artist is man, but when I saw artist is woman that was little shocked, but amazing. I really like her works and waiting for more in English :)
HH is one of my favourite female hentai artists, but I hate her love affair with NTR :/
and what i mean as what mimiko deserved to had in the end is happy live with her lover-ataru. not this stupid end

i couldnt agree more dude!! i think the author have a weird taste of netoserare- i mean mikiko is perfect in everyway why make her suffer much, at least give her what she deserve in the end- i could care less for that fat retard otaku since according to this his the one responsible for what happen to her

Wow, well that was depressing as all hell.  I kept reading on waiting for the two to make up somehow and live happily ever after.  The ending of the 43rd chapter was so sweet, why couldn't there be more of that?  But nope, we got this weird ass depressing ending that didn't really make a whole lotta sense.

Honestly I still can't even figure out what the impetus for this story even was.  Niiro shows up literally out of nowhere.  She's basically never mentioned in the story except when she's physically present.  They were childhood friends?  Alright, but the story doesn't offer any background or setting.  We know nothing about these characters except for the fact that they swapped bodies and one gave the other a Kidney.  Why does Niiro like him anyway?  He even mentions that he's a creep.  And then literally her second appearance in the story she's blackmailing them.  Whyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy?  God I fucking hate this author, his other manga had the exact same problems.

What the fuck kind of ending is this?  Honestly this was so unsatisfying like what happens to the other girl?  Why did the two never meet up again?  Literally what the fuck was this ending.  Like if it was a fucking bad end I'd be mad but I'd get over it, but it's just this weird cockblock ending where I feel like someone just told me I couldn't read the story past this point.
